scripts.build: npm run build:js  && npm run build:scss && npm run build:demo
scripts.build:js: babel src/jquery.fl-item.js --out-file  dist/jquery.fl-item.min.js --presets=babel-preset-env && uglifyjs --compress --mangle -o dist/jquery.fl-item.min.js -- dist/jquery.fl-item.min.js
scripts.build:demo: babel src/demo.js --out-file  dist/demo.js --presets=babel-preset-env && cp src/index.html dist/index.html
scripts.build:scss: node-sass src/scss/*.scss -o dist/ && npm run build-autoprefix-css
